Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Hmmm, it seems we're not the only one to call on Seniors for this battle. This could be trouble..

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Banktania brought more Seniors. Seniors have more firepower than Juniors, and they move more easily through difficult terrain.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: But all students are important. They may have more firepower, but we can use tactics.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Juniors move a little slower through mountains and rivers. Do you think that means you should avoid mountains?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: No way! Mountains will give you a defensive bonus for being in them! Use them to defeat the enemies!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Use mountains and forests as defense. Once you are defended by the mountains, the battle will all downhill!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Each student is important, so do your best to utilize them all.
